Package mcm.theater

Class Summary
Actor Actor is the abstract base class that all actors are derived from.
Arguments Arguments bundle runtime arguments relevant to Actors and Stage.
Play Play initializes a Stage and starts an initial Actor to run on that Stage.
ScreenSaver A ScreenSaver animates a Stage, whose Actors are created by the Director given to this Screensaver.
Stage A stage manages the painting of its actors onto its component.
 

Exception Summary
ActorDeath RuntimeException indicating that an Actor must terminate.
